SEARCH
Package control

Klasse DeletionAndCorrectionController

java.lang.Object
control.DeletionAndCorrectionController
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Constants
public class DeletionAndCorrectionController extends Object implements Constants

Deletion and Correction Controller

This class stores all the necessary methods to correct values of the given dataset or to delete invalid ones. This includes methods that might validate data. Borders for deeming a value invalid are sorted in the 'Constants' interface and should be adjusted before using this programm. Further information is given for each method in their respective documentation.

Seit:
2024-24-01
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Hannah Wollenweber

  • Methodendetails

    • createListOfIndicesToDelete

      public static ArrayList<Integer> createListOfIndicesToDelete(ArrayList<Tree> treeArrayList)
      Parameter:
      treeArrayList - ArrayList of trees
      Gibt zurück:
      ArrayList
      Precondition
      An ArrayList of Trees is given.
      Postcondition
      Whenever the values are unbelievable or unrepairable due to too many arguments missing, the index of that Tree is added to an ArrayList of Integers.

    • addIndex

      public static void addIndex(ArrayList<Integer> indices, ArrayList<Tree> treeArrayList, Tree tree)
      Parameter:
      indices - ArrayList of Integers that represent indices
      treeArrayList - ArrayList of trees
      tree - current tree
      Precondition
      The first given ArrayList is an ArrayList, the second is an ArrayList and the object is a Tree
      Postcondition
      The updated list with indices is returned

    • removeInvalidLines

      public static ArrayList<Tree> removeInvalidLines(ArrayList<Tree> treeArrayList, ArrayList<Integer> indicesToRemove)
      Parameter:
      treeArrayList - ArrayList of trees
      indicesToRemove - ArrayList containing Integers that represent indices which are supposed to be removed
      Gibt zurück:
      treeArrayList
      Precondition
      All parameters are passed correctly
      Postcondition
      returns ArrayList after deletion of trees

    • correctTreeValues

      public static Pair correctTreeValues(ArrayList<Tree> treeArrayList)
      Parameter:
      treeArrayList - ArrayList containing trees
      Gibt zurück:
      double
      Precondition
      an ArrayList of trees is passed that has the correct attributes specified in the model
      Postcondition
      the tree's attributes have been corrected if empty
